newsitem.title: USA: Amoco Corp Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Amoco Corp Q3 net rises.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: 1996 Q3 includes $97 million one-time gain from sale of polystyrene foam products business. Without the gain, 1996 Q3 results would have been earnings $538 million or $1.08/shr.
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: 1996 nine-month results include gains of $56 million in Q1 on certian Canadian asset dispositions and a Q3 $97 million gain for the sale of the company's polystyrene foam products business.
